Package bukkit.Vandolis

Class Summary
CodeRedBlockListener Block Listener class for any BlockEvent
CodeRedEconomy Main plugin file, registers Event and loads DataManager.
CodeRedPlayerListener Player Listener for handling all PlayerEvent
DataManager Used to load all of the data needed to run the plugin.
EconEntity Base entity for the economy.
EconStats A class for handling all of the buy/sell/pay stats going on.
Money Main class for anything money related.
PriceList Class used for displaying a shops stock to the player.
PropertiesFile  
Shop Class that handles buy/sell of items.
ShopGroup A class that contains group names as well as a list of the items that group is allowed to buy
ShopItem Class that is the base item used by the economy.
ShopItemStack Class that extends a ShopItem and adds a amount as well as total buy/sell prices
Transaction Class that handles any sort of economy action.
User Main player class for the economy.
 

Exception Summary
EconException Custom exception class for the economy.
